column2: "Dude, that Signo Beat's a big cheater. Decoy images are supposed to be just that--images!"
"Why the hell does that bastards clone come hitting?! This is no damn joke! Dammit!"
"Well, at least it was me, so I totally handled it. But your average ARKS member would had been dead before they knew what hit 'em."
"Anyway, I'll watch how YOU handle it, so go give it your best shot!"
